about_the_game:
The Level 2 Mastery Pack delivers key resources to expand your capabilities. With 1 month of Omega for faster training, 100 PLEX for trade and customization, and a 250,000 SP Apprentice Bundle, this pack helps you advance and take on new challenges in New Eden. 

Contents: 

  • 1 month Omega 

  • 100 PLEX 

  • Apprentice Bundle (250,000 SP + Genius ‘Boost’ Cerebral Accelerator) 

Single purchase per account.
detailed_description:
The Level 2 Mastery Pack delivers key resources to expand your capabilities. With 1 month of Omega for faster training, 100 PLEX for trade and customization, and a 250,000 SP Apprentice Bundle, this pack helps you advance and take on new challenges in New Eden. 

Contents: 

  • 1 month Omega 

  • 100 PLEX 

  • Apprentice Bundle (250,000 SP + Genius ‘Boost’ Cerebral Accelerator) 

Single purchase per account.
name: EVE Online: Level 2 Mastery pack

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: EVE Online: Level 2 Mastery pack - $20.00 USD

package_groups.title: Buy EVE Online: Level 2 Mastery pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz, AMD Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB or higher
  • Video: AMD Radeon 5450 or NVIDIA GeForce 420 or better with at least 1024 MB VRAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700 or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 @ 3.6 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB or greater
  • Video: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580 or better with at least 4 GB VRAM

short_description: More power, more possibilities. Get 1 month of Omega, PLEX, and Skill Points to accelerate training, trade for ISK, or customize your experience in New Eden.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, Russian*, French*, Korean*, Japanese*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
